categories: Category:Star Wars: The Official Starships & Vehicles Collection departments

nodes.text: In Command is a main feature of Star Wars: The Official Starships & Vehicles Collection magazine, a four-page foldout that includes technical drawings, specifications and annoted key features on the craft that is the focus of its given issue. This same craft is highlighted on the issue's cover and, in the form of a die-cast collector's model, is packed in exclusively with the magazine.
